column5: Does anybody have any reviews or fished this area before? Outpost looks great just wondering how the fishing, accommodations, and owner are! Thanks!
Are you talking out of Minaki?
Yes sorry the one out of Minaki.

I have been going to this area for 40 years and have stayed in these beautiful cabins several times recently when they are available, I can not say enough about these cabins. The owners are first class and very easy to get along with. The fishing is typically very good for walleyes, smallmouths, and muskies.

Yes first class, very nicely done. We have stayed there a few times also. These are more like homes, not cabins with the exception of the ice house and out house for #2. (Ice house is very cool though) You are pretty much left alone after being dropped off and let in unless you need something. You are much closer to world class fishing than being in town in my humble opinion. I highly recommend them if you can get in.
